transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir, abhi aa rahi hai aawaz?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, main keh raha tha jaise do numberon pe baat hota hai, ek toh aapka 007 hai secondary number.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Woh bhi aapke hi hai kya ya father hai aapke?
Customer: Staff ka hai.
Executive: Achha woh staff ka hai, toh woh kaun sa maal tha sir?
Customer: Yahan pe koi bhi hai, teen log utha rahe hain, receive karte hain teenon.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Toh main abhi dekh leta hun, unse hi baat hua tha mera jo bhi hai karte hain mere se baat cheet. Toh shayad aap.
Customer: Main nahi baat nahi ki thi.
Executive: Achha aap nahi kari thi? Ek toh sir woh confusing ho raha hai mere ko thoda sa ki toh yeh abhi aap by lead ki keh rahe hain na, main balance check kar le raha hun, abhi toh yeh hai na ki is hafte ka by lead ka balance zero ho chuka hai sir aapka, 17 jo hai consume ho gayi hongi.
Executive: Jaise weekly ka rehta hai na 17 by lead ka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh abhi jaise Thursday hai na, toh is wajah se hi aapko dikha raha hoga woh. Toh abhi woh Sunday se dobara renew ho jayega 17 jo hai aapka balance.
Customer: Kal bhi aisa dikha raha tha par aaj toh ek mili thi, aaj ek do consume kari maine.
Executive: Achha toh woh pata hai kya hua hoga, yeh aapka naam hai na Mahesh Advani sahib?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, theek hai sir abhi matlab aapse hi baat hua hai mera achhi baat hai ki kyunki yeh hai na woh staff se hi baat jo bhi aapke unse hi hota hai hamara baat toh aap se toh yeh hua maine unhe bataya ki 10 by lead aapko pata hai weekly ka rehta hai, yeh ek by lead aapka daily basis pe milta hai toh ek ek karke saat ho gaya aur 10 17 matlab aise karke rehta hai. Toh kya woh hoga ki 10 aapka consume ho gaya hoga aur fir kya daily ka mil raha hoga aapko, daily ka ek ek karke jaise aap bata rahe ho kal aapka consume ho gaya hoga.
Executive: Ab woh cheez rahi hogi.
Customer: Theek hai, samajh gaya.
Executive: Toh iska Sunday se renew hoga na?
Customer: Ji?
Customer: Sunday se renew hoga na?
Executive: Haan Sunday se ho jayega, Sunday se dobara jaise aaj 6 November ko aapne ek pishachio ki by lead uthai hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Agra se jo bhi hai toh yeh aaj ki woh ho gaya. Aur baki Advani sahab matlab main unse bhi baat kar raha tha pehle toh woh unse bhi puch raha tha main toh kyunki aapka aapko pata hai ki December mein renewal bhi pending hai. Toh mere toh bahut dinon se pehle se baat chal rahi hai sir unse bhi. Kyunki secondary number pe hi connect hua tha toh woh keh rahe the ki sir aisa koi khas apne ko business aaya nahi hai yeh sab cheeze. Toh maine unhe kaha theek hai ki aap May, June, July mein toh bilkul nahi chalaya hai, bilkul service aapke use nahi hua.
Executive: Theek hai aur maine unko kaha bhi tha ki main aapko by lead wagera bhejta bhi hun aur main bhejta bhi hun unko jo bhi hai matlab kyunki meri toh unse hi baat hui toh mujhe laga concern person yahi hai. Kabhi matlab maine aise primary number pe.
Customer: Mere se hi baat hui hai jitni baar bhi baat hui hai sab baar mere se hi baat hui hai aaj ki.
Executive: Achha kal bhi aapse hui thi?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kal bhi kal hui hai sir hamari kisi secondary number pe aapka jo yeh hai na number 007.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh dekhiye sir aaj sari baat aapke agar aap owner hai aapka primary number se call aaya toh dekhiye yeh hai main toh unhe itne dinon se educate kar raha hun ki aapko pata agar aapko lag raha hai ki haan theek hai by lead wagera se apne ko business aana hai just for visibility purpose ya jaise bhi apne ko business nikalna hai kyunki maine unhe bataya tha ki aapki location se Ahmedabad Gujarat se bahut sare supplier hai TrustSeal mein bhi run kar rahe hain. Aapko pata hoga higher services mein toh maine kaha sir isko just aap renewal ke liye proceed karo toh unki taraf se mere ko koi aisa consideration nahi mila kyunki aapko pata hai portal pe updated price ho chuka hai 32000 plus GST 33767 but maine unko advice kara tha.
Customer: Apne aage karenge main leads consume karke aapko bataunga last date tak.
Executive: Wahi wahi toh main isliye keh raha hun aap dekh lijiyega ki sir to be honest aapka jo aap dekhoge na 32000 mein renewal generate hua hai aapka toh hum shayad agle mahine aapko na yeh price nahi de payenge jo aapne purana 28 plus GST mein kara hai isliye main keh raha tha yeh yeh mahina toh aapka chal hi raha hai toh kyunki yeh hai ki aap agar aapko karna hai na karna hai woh wali baat hai ki aap bata rahe hain ki karenge toh agar aap mere ko karwate hain matlab confirmation toh yeh main 28 plus GST jo old amount hai usme aapka main.
Customer: Woh last date apne ek week baki hoga na tab apne baat karte hain iske bare mein, theek hai?
Executive: Achha tabhi matlab aap karenge toh yeh aap samajhiyega last toh aapka dekhiye yeh hai na December mein hai sir starting mein hi dikha raha hai mere ko.
Customer: Haan toh ek mahina bacha hai na jaane do 10-15 din.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai toh koi dikkat nahi main aapse ek bari na ek kaam karta hun agle agle hafte ek bari aapse puch leta hun baat karke hai na.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai tab tak aap consume karna next week se jo hai matlab by lead ka balance jo hai na woh aa jayega aapka jo bhi 17 ka rehta hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Bhai yeh aapka WhatsApp number hi hai Advani sahab?
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai toh ek kaam karta hun main bhi aapko kuch by lead jab tak ke liye bhejta hun kyunki main unko bhej raha tha main aapko bhi bhejta rehta hun theek hai. Aap isko consume karte rahiye hai na.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap mera number save kar lena mera hai na mere ko directly call kar lena.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says bylead balance is zero.

- Customer says he received only one buylead today.

- Customer says renewal is pending in December.



Resolution:

- Executive explained weekly and daily buylead distribution.

- Executive confirmed renewal price is 32000 plus GST.

- Executive offered to send buyleads in the meantime.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will decide about renewal in one week.

- Executive will call next week to follow up.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, renewal, balance
